meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'fal'

languageKey.label: File Migration
Moves, indexes and reference files

Limit migration per recurrence to this amount (integer). Keep in mind, that the higher the number is, the longer it takes the server to finish a recurrence. So the possibility to have a timeout raises.
Migrate only selected tables or take all tables if no selection was made
Records per recurrence taken
